nodes.text: Cobb Vanth's speeder was a custom built repulsorcraft vehicle that was made from a modified 620C podracing engine. Cobb Vanth, the marshal of the Tatooine town Mos Pelgo, used the speeder to travel the Jundland Wastes and protect his people. He piloted the craft during his attempts to kill a krayt dragon that had terrorized his town around 9 ABY.
